overview: Designed to help you live a healthier (and sexier) life, Cardiogasm offers fitness and wellness videos that will energize, revitalize, and get you off all at once! Taught by some of the hottest women on earth, these at-home workouts include yoga, dance cardio, free weights, and routines to train (and tease) the arms, legs, chest, abs, and booty! Each episode offers a legitimate workout session, followed by a relaxing sexual experience.
title: Cardiogasm
